step1.coordinatesDetails: Please check the coordinates for your pin and change another location if needed
step1.locationDescription: Please choose the exact or nearest place

initial.title: Click or drag file to this area to upload
initial.description: You can upload up to 10 files by adding them all together or separately

filled.title: Wonderful! You did it!
filled.description: You can upload up to 10 files by adding them all together or separately

locationDescription.title: Describe the location
locationDescription.description: Type additional description if it helps to define the location

success.title: Thank you
success.description: Our moderators will review the location and if it is accurate it will be added to our interactive map

reject.title: Something went wrong
reject.description: Try to send the files again
